Description:
Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Event Viewer RecentViews

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: UAC Bypass Using Event Viewer RecentViews
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%\event viewer\recentviews%' or command like '%\eventv~1\recentviews%') and command like '%>%')
